title: (x) french chic - which font please? - Ultra-thin sans with contrast - probably custom, various suggestions {Wouter, Riccardo}
content:
would like to identify this font please

comments.content: Reminds me of [this custom font](http://web.archive.org/web/20120507000228/http:/www.buero-newyork.com/content/another-magazine-7-exactly/am7-exactly-0.jpg) called Penny Bee, made for Another Magazine by [Buero New York](http://web.archive.org/web/20120507000228/http:/www.buero-newyork.com/).
